citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 PM on
24-Jul-18.
Knocked on the door and the licensees daughter answered. The daughter stated that the licensee had a previously
scheduled appointment.
